roleset.name: expose to radiation again

example.name: reirradiate-v
example.text: Based on the wavelength dependence of dimer formation and reversal, they irradiated transforming DNA isolated from Hemophilus influenzae at 280 nm, assayed for transforming activity, then reirradiated the DNA at 240 nm, and again assayed for transformation.
example.arg: Based on the wavelength dependence of dimer formation and reversal,
transforming DNA isolated from Hemophilus influenzae at 280 nm,

example.name: reirradiation-n
example.text: In this heterogeneous group of patients reirradiation of locoregional recurrences of breast cancer showed low to moderate acute toxicity.
example.arg: of locoregional recurrences of breast cancer

roleset.note: REIRRADIATE-V, REIRRADIATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.
